content: stitchy sprint board game thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size 15 wide x 17 5 long after blocking materials worsted weight #4 yarn o small amounts of white o 50 yds each of black red orange yellow green blue purple o 200 yds each of dark grey light grey 4mm hook plastic canvas granny grating needle hot glue scissors fiber fill gauge not necessary but your finished size may vary stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch double_crochet -double blo -back loops st -stitch crochet only chain -chain increase -increase puff = *yarn over single_crochet -single decrease -decrease pull up loop* 3 crochet flo -front loops times yarn over half_double_crochet -half double only pull through all crochet loops on hook pattern notes # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each stitch for # stitches st st st means to work all the indicated stitches into the same stitch the squares will be joined together via slip stitches designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items crab with red round 1 in a magic_ring 6 single_crochet 6 2 *increase* 6 times 12 3 *single_crochet increase* 6 times 18 4-5 2 rounds single_crochet in each st 6 working in flo chain 6 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 chain 3 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 5 *slip_stitch in next st* twice chain 6 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 2 chain 3 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 5 *slip_stitch in next st* twice *slip_stitch in next st chain 4 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3* three times *slip_stitch in next st* four times *slip_stitch in next st chain 4 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 3* three times *slip_stitch in next st* twice 7 working in remaining blo of r5 *single_crochet decrease* 6 times 12 stuff with fiber fill 8 *decrease* 6 times fasten_off use tail to close hole cat with orange round 1 chain 5 3 single_crochet 3sc in last chain working on opposite side of chain 3 single_crochet 3sc in first chain 12 2 3 single_crochet *increase* 3 times 3 single_crochet *increase* three times 18 3 puff 3 single_crochet puff 4 single_crochet puff 3 single_crochet puff 4sc 4 7 single_crochet chain 5 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch 4 11 single_crochet 5 single_crochet in each st 6 2 single_crochet chain 3 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch half_double_crochet 12 single_crochet chain 3 starting in 2nd chain from hook slip_stitch half_double_crochet 4 single_crochet 7 decrease 3 single_crochet *decrease* three times 3 single_crochet *decrease* 2 times fasten_off stuff with fiber fill use tail to sew hole closed long-ways designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items bee with yellow round 1 in magic_ring 6sc 6 2 *increase* 6 times 12 3
